verses.verse: Then a shoot <WH2415> will spring <WH3318> from the stem <WH1503> of Jesse, <WH3448> And a branch <WH5342> from his roots <WH8328> will bear <WH6509> fruit. <WH6509>

And the Spirit <WH7307> of the Lord <WH3068> will rest <WH5117> on Him, The spirit <WH7307> of wisdom <WH2451> and understanding, <WH998> The spirit <WH7307> of counsel <WH6098> and strength, <WH1369> The spirit <WH7307> of knowledge <WH1847> and the fear <WH3374> of the Lord. <WH3068>

And He will delight <WH9552> in the fear <WH3374> of the Lord, <WH3068> And He will not judge <WH8199> by what <WH4758> His eyes <WH5869> see, <WH4758> Nor <WH3808> make <WH3198> a decision <WH3198> by what <WH4926> His ears <WH241> hear; <WH4926>

But with righteousness <WH6664> He will judge <WH8199> the poor, <WH1800> And decide <WH3198> with fairness <WH4334> for the afflicted <WH6035> of the earth; <WH776> And He will strike <WH5221> the earth <WH776> with the rod <WH7626> of His mouth, <WH6310> And with the breath <WH7307> of His lips <WH8193> He will slay <WH4191> the wicked. <WH7563>
Also righteousness <WH6664> will be the belt <WH232> about His loins, <WH2504> And faithfulness <WH530> the belt <WH232> about His waist. <WH2504>

And the wolf <WH2061> will dwell <WH1481> with the lamb, <WH3532> And the leopard <WH5246> will lie <WH7257> down <WH7257> with the kid, <WH1423> And the calf <WH5695> and the young <WH3715> lion <WH3715> and the fatling <WH4806> together; <WH9191> And a little <WH9512> boy <WH5288> will lead <WH5090> them.

Also the cow <WH6510> and the bear <WH1677> will graze; <WH7462> Their young <WH3206> will lie <WH7257> down <WH7257> together; <WH9191> And the lion <WH9030> will eat <WH398> straw <WH8401> like the ox. <WH1241>
And the nursing <WH3243> child will play <WH8173> by the hole <WH2352> of the cobra, <WH6620> And the weaned <WH1580> child will put <WH1911> his hand <WH3027> on the viper's den. <WH3975>

They will not hurt <WH7489> or destroy <WH7843> in all <WH3605> My holy <WH6944> mountain, <WH2022> For the earth <WH776> will be full <WH4390> of the knowledge <WH1844> of the Lord <WH3068> As the waters <WH4325> cover <WH3680> the sea. <WH3220>

Then it will come <WH1961> about in that day <WH3117> That the nations <WH1471> will resort <WH1875> to the root <WH8328> of Jesse, <WH3448> Who <WH834> will stand <WH5975> as a signal <WH5251> for the peoples; <WH5971> And His resting <WH4496> place <WH4496> will be glorious. <WH9202>

Then it will happen <WH1961> on that day <WH3117> that the Lord <WH136> Will again <WH3254> recover <WH7069> the second <WH8145> time <WH8145> with His hand <WH3027> The remnant <WH7605> of His people, <WH5971> who <WH834> will remain, <WH7604> From Assyria, <WH804> Egypt, <WH4714> Pathros, <WH6624> Cush, <WH3568> Elam, <WH5867> Shinar, <WH8152> Hamath, <WH2574> And from the islands <WH339> of the sea. <WH3220>

And He will lift <WH5375> up a standard <WH5251> for the nations, <WH1471> And will assemble <WH622> the banished <WH5080> ones of Israel, <WH3478> And will gather <WH6908> the dispersed <WH9339> of Judah <WH3063> From the four <WH702> corners <WH3671> of the earth. <WH776>

Then the jealousy <WH7068> of Ephraim <WH669> will depart, <WH5493> And those who harass <WH6887> Judah <WH3063> will be cut <WH3772> off; <WH3772> Ephraim <WH669> will not be jealous <WH7065> of Judah, <WH3063> And Judah <WH3063> will not harass <WH6887> Ephraim. <WH669>

And they will swoop <WH5774> down <WH5774> on the slopes <WH3802> of the Philistines <WH6430> on the west; <WH3220> Together <WH9191> they will plunder <WH962> the sons <WH1121> of the east; <WH6924> They will possess <WH4916> <WH3027> Edom <WH9000> and Moab; <WH4124> And the sons <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> will be subject <WH4928> to them.

And the Lord <WH3068> will utterly <WH2763> destroy <WH2763> The tongue <WH3956> of the Sea <WH3220> of Egypt; <WH4714> And He will wave <WH5130> His hand <WH3027> over <WH5921> the River <WH5104> With His scorching <WH5868> wind; <WH7307> And He will strike <WH5221> it into seven <WH7651> streams, <WH5158> And make [men] walk <WH1869> over dry-shod.

And there will be a highway <WH4546> from Assyria <WH804> For the remnant <WH7605> of His people <WH5971> who <WH834> will be left, <WH7604> Just <WH9201> as there was for Israel <WH3478> In the day <WH3117> that they came <WH5927> up out of the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>
